question: Based on the stacked bar chart, which quarter shows the best overall restaurant performance?

options.A: Q3 has the best performance because it has the highest stacked total.
options.B: Q2 has the best performance because it has the highest sales with moderate other metrics.
options.C: The chart cannot determine overall performance accurately.
options.D: Q1 has the best performance because it has the lowest customer complaints.

explanation: The chart stacks unrelated metrics (sales, kitchen temperature, customer complaints) into a single total. The stacked height is meaningless because these metrics cannot be meaningfully combined. Only individual metric comparisons are valid.
